description: Bowles' golden sedge (Carex elata 'Aurea') is an amazing plant species, well worth adding to your garden. It is an evergreen perennial with bright golden-yellow blades that make a striking feature in the garden. It prefers full sun or partial shade and is resistant to most common pests, diseases, and drought. It has a mounding habit of arching foliage that ripples in the wind and is ideal for creating lawns, edging, and rockeries. It is a great alternative to grass as it requires very little maintenance and its beautiful color brings life to any space. Bowles' golden sedge is a must-have for any garden.
